Hi,
My name is Erik Michael Swan. While studying literature at university, I discovered a love for websites. Now, I combine these passions to develop compelling websites supported by excellent written and oral communication skills.

I have a reputation for being able to tackle any project because of my ability to learn quickly — and I do love a good challenge.

Below, you will find a summary of my education and portfolio highlighting the types of value I can deliver.

Education

UC Berkeley

Class of 2014
Bachelor's of Arts in English Literature with an emphasis in British Victorian
GPA: 3.91 (High Distinction)

Honors:
Awarded H.W. Hill scholarship in 2014 for "exceptional work of the highest calibur." Four to six awarded annually by faculty nomination.

Inducted into Phi Beta Kappa, Alpha of California chapter in 2014.

University of Cambridge

Pembroke/King's Programme 2013
Supervision in Creative Writing under Professional Author Brian Keaney
Metaphysics and the Philosophy of the Mind
Criminology
GPA: 3.9

Portfolio

For more detailed information on my work history and responsibilities, please visit my LinkedIn profile.

Web

Durect

durect.com

  • Developed front end for website for Durect Corporation, a biopharmaceutical company
  • Highlights: homepage 'hero tabs'; pipeline page with dynamic fixed headers

Ariad

ariad.com

  • Developed front end for website for Ariad Pharmaceuticals, Inc., an oncology company
  • Highlights: custom pipeline, fully responsive

HDMZ

hdmz.com

  • Developed front end for all interior pages of website for HDMZ, a marketing communications agency
  • Highlights: styled nav and logo animation, styled "Leadership" block on the About page and the scalable hover effects on the Markets and Expertise pages

Pexa-Vec Trials

pexavectrials.com

  • Developed front end for website for the PHOCUS trial, investigating a Phase 3 liver cancer drug called Pexa-Vec (JX-594)
  • Highlights: Mobile overlay menu, responsive hero images

XtraLease Landing Page

hdmz.com

  • Developed interactive landing page for XtraLease's trailer tracking marketing campaign
  • Highlights: interactive roadmap pin travels down the page on click; IE 9 compatible

CapGenesis

capgenesis.com

  • Created front end for CapGenesis Therapeutics website, a pharmaceutical and consumer healthcare company
  • Highlights: homepage feature area fits all viewports; fully responsive

Web Projects

List of All Members of Congress

  • A list of all members of congress, built in Angular
  • Utilizes open data at govtrack.us through ajax

Touchscreen App for AMP 2015 Conference

For the Ion Torrent™ Oncomine™ Focus Assay

  • A Touchscreen app that runs in Chrome, featuring a fully animated carousel with touch feedback
  • Developed for ThermoFisher Scientific, an American multinational, biotechnology product development company

mediaQuery.js

  • An extension for jQuery to help handle media queries in javascript
  • Currently only has parsing capabilities, returning a boolean after evaluating strings such as ">380 && <768" against the current viewport
  • Will ultimately support callbacks to run when matching and not matching the passed media query
